complianceInfTsi.description: Property. Compliance of the tunnel with INF TSI

demonstrationSRT.description: Property. EI declaration of demonstration for tunnel (SRT)

dieselThermalAllowed.description: Property. Diesel or other thermal traction allowed

hasEvacuationAndRescuePoints.description: Property. Existence of evacuation and rescue points

nationalRollingStockFireCategory.description: Property. National fire category of rolling stock required

tunnelDocRef.description: Property. Reference to a document available from the IM with precise description of the tunnel

verificationSRT.description: Property. EC declaration of verification for tunnel (SRT)

title: Tunnel + mapped from ERA ontology by Smart Data Models
description: A railway tunnel is an excavation or a construction around the track provided to allow the railway to pass for example higher land, buildings or water.
